sig_info: While the Opponent is rooted Dash Attacks grant a Trample Passive, making the attack Unblockable except against Well-Timed Blocks
While the Opponent is rooted all Bleeds are Critical Bleeds, multiplying their Potency by 100 to 170.03% of Kraven’s Critical Damage.

JUNGLE FIGHTER: Heavy Attack: First hit inflicts a non-stacking Disorient Debuff, decreasing Block Proficiency and Defensive Ability Accuracy by 40% for 16 second(s).
Critical Hits: Inflict a Bleed Debuff, dealing 19.92 Direct over 8 second(s).
WHEN DEBUFFED - ENDURANCE PASSIVE: Each time Kraven receives a non-damaging Debuff, reduce the duration of future non-damaging Debuffs by 10% for the rest of the fight. Max 8 stacks.
TRAP - SPECIAL 1: If the Opponent moves into a Trap, it springs and deals a Burst of 62.25 Direct Damage and Roots them for 5 second(s). Damage scales with Base Attack only. If the Opponent moves into the Trap during a special, the Trap is removed.
If the Opponent is pushed into the Trap by a Heavy or Special 2, Kraven has a 100% chance to place a new Trap when the Root expires.
Rooted Champions cannot move, but can still attack, block, and dodge. Activating a Special Attack removes Root and prevents it from applying.
While the Opponent is rooted, Kraven's Dash Attacks become Unstoppable, his damage over time Debuffs are paused and he gains 1066.67 Critical Rating.
While the Opponent is rooted, their Combat Power Rate is reduced by 37.5%.
SUPPRESSION - CROSS-FIGHT: Traps also inflict a Cross-Fight Suppression Passive on the Opponent, reducing Combat Power Rate by 6.25% for this and the next 5 fights. Max 2 stacks. Traps cannot suppress Opponents with Natural Class Advantage.
In the following fights Suppression Potency is increased by 100%.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Root Debuff and Precision Buff are paused.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Kraven sets a Trap at the Opponent location, the Trap arms after 5 second(s) and lasts until triggered. New Traps replace existing ones. As a Defender Traps are placed at his location and arms immediately. Traps are not affected by Ability Accuracy reduction.
If the Opponent is already rooted by a Trap, Critical Damage Rating is increased by 139.13 for the duration of this Attack instead.
Bleed effects are paused.
Gain a non-stacking True Accuracy Buff for 20 second(s). Triggering a Trap refreshes this effect.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: On activation, gain a Precision Buff, increasing Critical Rating by 824.24 for 20 second(s). Triggering a Trap refreshes this effect. Max 5 stacks.
The first hit is Unblockable and inflicts a Poison Debuff, reducing Health Recovery by 30% and Dealing 83 Direct Damage over 3 second(s).
If the Opponent is rooted, refresh all Bleed effects.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain a Cruelty Buff, increasing Critical Damage Rating by 177.78 until Kraven is knocked down.
If the Opponent is rooted they gain no Power during the Special and the potency of the Cruelty Buff is increased by 100%.
If the Opponent is not rooted but a Trap is placed, even if not armed, the Trap springs regardless of the Opponent’s position.

sig_info: While the Opponent is rooted Dash Attacks grant a Trample Passive, making the attack Unblockable except against Well-Timed Blocks
While the Opponent is rooted all Bleeds are Critical Bleeds, multiplying their Potency by 100 to 170.03% of Kraven’s Critical Damage.

JUNGLE FIGHTER: Heavy Attack: First hit inflicts a non-stacking Disorient Debuff, decreasing Block Proficiency and Defensive Ability Accuracy by 40% for 16 second(s).
Critical Hits: Inflict a Bleed Debuff, dealing 208.56 Direct over 8 second(s).
WHEN DEBUFFED - ENDURANCE PASSIVE: Each time Kraven receives a non-damaging Debuff, reduce the duration of future non-damaging Debuffs by 10% for the rest of the fight. Max 8 stacks.
TRAP - SPECIAL 1: If the Opponent moves into a Trap, it springs and deals a Burst of 651.75 Direct Damage and Roots them for 5 second(s). Damage scales with Base Attack only. If the Opponent moves into the Trap during a special, the Trap is removed.
If the Opponent is pushed into the Trap by a Heavy or Special 2, Kraven has a 100% chance to place a new Trap when the Root expires.
Rooted Champions cannot move, but can still attack, block, and dodge. Activating a Special Attack removes Root and prevents it from applying.
While the Opponent is rooted, Kraven's Dash Attacks become Unstoppable, his damage over time Debuffs are paused and he gains 1300 Critical Rating.
While the Opponent is rooted, their Combat Power Rate is reduced by 37.5%.
SUPPRESSION - CROSS-FIGHT: Traps also inflict a Cross-Fight Suppression Passive on the Opponent, reducing Combat Power Rate by 6.25% for this and the next 5 fights. Max 2 stacks. Traps cannot suppress Opponents with Natural Class Advantage.
In the following fights Suppression Potency is increased by 100%.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Root Debuff and Precision Buff are paused.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Kraven sets a Trap at the Opponent location, the Trap arms after 5 second(s) and lasts until triggered. New Traps replace existing ones. As a Defender Traps are placed at his location and arms immediately. Traps are not affected by Ability Accuracy reduction.
If the Opponent is already rooted by a Trap, Critical Damage Rating is increased by 169.56 for the duration of this Attack instead.
Bleed effects are paused.
Gain a non-stacking True Accuracy Buff for 20 second(s). Triggering a Trap refreshes this effect.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: On activation, gain a Precision Buff, increasing Critical Rating by 1004.55 for 20 second(s). Triggering a Trap refreshes this effect. Max 5 stacks.
The first hit is Unblockable and inflicts a Poison Debuff, reducing Health Recovery by 30% and Dealing 869 Direct Damage over 3 second(s).
If the Opponent is rooted, refresh all Bleed effects.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain a Cruelty Buff, increasing Critical Damage Rating by 216.67 until Kraven is knocked down.
If the Opponent is rooted they gain no Power during the Special and the potency of the Cruelty Buff is increased by 100%.
If the Opponent is not rooted but a Trap is placed, even if not armed, the Trap springs regardless of the Opponent’s position.

If the Opponent is rooted they gain no Power during the Special and the potency of the Cruelty Buff is increased by 100%.
If the Opponent is not rooted but a Trap is placed, even if not armed, the Trap springs regardless of the Opponent’s position.

sig_info: While the Opponent is rooted Dash Attacks grant a Trample Passive, making the attack Unblockable except against Well-Timed Blocks
While the Opponent is rooted all Bleeds are Critical Bleeds, multiplying their Potency by 102.45 to 200% of Kraven’s Critical Damage.

JUNGLE FIGHTER: Heavy Attack: First hit inflicts a non-stacking Disorient Debuff, decreasing Block Proficiency and Defensive Ability Accuracy by 40% for 16 second(s).
Critical Hits: Inflict a Bleed Debuff, dealing 822.48 Direct over 8 second(s).
WHEN DEBUFFED - ENDURANCE PASSIVE: Each time Kraven receives a non-damaging Debuff, reduce the duration of future non-damaging Debuffs by 10% for the rest of the fight. Max 8 stacks.
TRAP - SPECIAL 1: If the Opponent moves into a Trap, it springs and deals a Burst of 2570.25 Direct Damage and Roots them for 5 second(s). Damage scales with Base Attack only. If the Opponent moves into the Trap during a special, the Trap is removed.
If the Opponent is pushed into the Trap by a Heavy or Special 2, Kraven has a 100% chance to place a new Trap when the Root expires.
Rooted Champions cannot move, but can still attack, block, and dodge. Activating a Special Attack removes Root and prevents it from applying.
While the Opponent is rooted, Kraven's Dash Attacks become Unstoppable, his damage over time Debuffs are paused and he gains 1466.67 Critical Rating.
While the Opponent is rooted, their Combat Power Rate is reduced by 37.5%.
SUPPRESSION - CROSS-FIGHT: Traps also inflict a Cross-Fight Suppression Passive on the Opponent, reducing Combat Power Rate by 6.25% for this and the next 5 fights. Max 2 stacks. Traps cannot suppress Opponents with Natural Class Advantage.
In the following fights Suppression Potency is increased by 100%.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Root Debuff and Precision Buff are paused.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Kraven sets a Trap at the Opponent location, the Trap arms after 5 second(s) and lasts until triggered. New Traps replace existing ones. As a Defender Traps are placed at his location and arms immediately. Traps are not affected by Ability Accuracy reduction.
If the Opponent is already rooted by a Trap, Critical Damage Rating is increased by 191.3 for the duration of this Attack instead.
Bleed effects are paused.
Gain a non-stacking True Accuracy Buff for 20 second(s). Triggering a Trap refreshes this effect.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: On activation, gain a Precision Buff, increasing Critical Rating by 1133.33 for 20 second(s). Triggering a Trap refreshes this effect. Max 5 stacks.
The first hit is Unblockable and inflicts a Poison Debuff, reducing Health Recovery by 30% and Dealing 3427 Direct Damage over 3 second(s).
If the Opponent is rooted, refresh all Bleed effects.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain a Cruelty Buff, increasing Critical Damage Rating by 244.45 until Kraven is knocked down.
If the Opponent is rooted they gain no Power during the Special and the potency of the Cruelty Buff is increased by 100%.
If the Opponent is not rooted but a Trap is placed, even if not armed, the Trap springs regardless of the Opponent’s position.
